TABLE.NAME: mooduell
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the mooduell activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: quizid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the quiz this mooduell instance is linked to. it may be null until we have actually created a link to a certain quiz

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: useFullNames
FIELD.COMMENT: Students can't see the full name of their peers (0), They can see the fullname, if Moodle configuration allows it (1)

FIELD.NAME: showContinueButton
FIELD.COMMENT: Treat every question as a multi answer question, where we have to press 'continue' to register the answer (1) Register answer of single answer questions directy by pressing the answer button

FIELD.NAME: showCorrectAnswer
FIELD.COMMENT: After wrongly answering a querstion, should the right answer by highmarked? (1) Correct answer will not be shown (0)

FIELD.NAME: useCountDown
FIELD.COMMENT: Do you want to use the countdown and how much time do your students have to answer a question?

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.
